## Upcoming deadlines

## Learning Objectives

By the end of the class, students should be able to:

-   Describe the difference between parametric and nonparametric statistical tests

-   Identify when to use a two-sample t-test, a paired t-test, a chi-squared test, and ANOVA

## Class prep

[Introduction to Modern Statistics chapter 20](https://openintro-ims.netlify.app/inference-two-means) sections 20.3 and 20.4

By the end of the reading, you should be able to answer the following questions:

-   What is the difference between the test statistic and the observed statistic?

-   When can we conduct a t-test?

-   What are the steps to conduct a t-test?
